name: 賴炎生
objective:
Objective: 
To understand the techniques required for the development of inverter, including modeling, simulation, PWM control, vector control, direct torque control, multilevel inverter control
Some problems and the related solutions for inverter are also included
Outline:
變頻器簡介及應用 (1/1)

感應馬達數學模式 (2/5)
變頻驅動感應向量控制 (3/8)
無感測向量控制 (1/9)
變頻器脈波寬度調變 (2/11)
直接轉矩控制 (1/12)
多階變頻器 (1/13)
